introduction.en: A free application dedicated to recording videos from online live streaming platforms. By integrating FFmpeg, it efficiently and reliably records live streams from over 40 major platforms including Douyin, TikTok, Kuaishou, Huya, Douyu, Bilibili, Rednote, Baidu, Weibo, Kuwo, Migu, Twitch, YouTube, PandaTV, SoopLive, FlexTV(TTing), PopKontv, Twitcasting, WinkTV, 17Live, Acfun, CHZZK, and Shopee.

en.title: StreamCap v1.0.2 is officially released

en.title: Usage tips
en.content: Press Alt + H on Windows or Option + H on Mac to quickly access the shortcut help document, improve your work efficiency.
